text: Göingeflickorna was a girl vocal trio from Sweden. It was active between 1955-1955. The members were sisters Sonja Martinsson (1934–2013), Barbro Svensson (born 1941) and Agnetha Gardelid (born 1945). Their major breakthrough came in 1961 with the song Kära mor. Barbro left the trio in 1975. Sonja and Agnetha then continued appearing together. == Svensktoppen songs == *Vår lyckodröm - 1962 *Där näckrosen blommar - 1963 *Säterjäntans söndag - 1965 *När Solen ler - 1974 *Balsalens drottning – 1980 ==References== Category:1955 establishments in Sweden Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1975 Category:Swedish musical groups Category:20th-century disestablishments in Sweden Category:1975 disestablishments in Europe
title: Göingeflickorna
